thread.title: Soros Hires New Chief Investment Officer
thread.title_full: Soros Hires New Chief Investment Officer - WSJ

author: Gregory Zuckerman
title: Soros Hires New Chief Investment Officer
text:
Soros Fund Management LLC has hired one of the most prominent women in the hedge fund industry as its new chief investment officer, according to someone close to the matter.
Dawn Fitzpatrick was head of investments at UBS Asset Management, where she was global head of equities, multiasset and the Oâ€™Connor hedge-fund business. Ms. Fitzpatrick is the seventh person to hold the job of CIO at Soros since April 2000, when...
